frame.name: Stimulus_focus
frame.definition: <def-root>In this frame either a <fen>Stimulus</fen> brings about a particular emotion or experience in the <fen>Experiencer</fen> or saliently fails to bring about a particular experience. Some words indicate that the <fen>Stimulus</fen> is characterized by the experience it is likely to evoke in an <fen>Experiencer</fen> and for these, the <fen>Experiencer</fen> may rarely be present. There may also be a <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Stimulus</fen> affects the <fen>Experiencer</fen> and <fen>Circumstances</fen> under which the experience occurs. There may also be a <fen>Comparison_set</fen> to which the <fen>Stimulus</fen> is compared and a <fen>Parameter</fen> that indicates the area in which the <fen>Stimulus</fen> has its effect. <ex> <fex name="Stimulus">The view</fex> is <t>breathtaking</t> <fex name="Circumstances">in January</fex>. </ex> <ex> <fex name="Stimulus">That movie</fex> was <fex name="Degree">quite</fex> <t>fascinating</t>. </ex> <ex> That was certainly a <t>gratifying</t> <fex name="Stimulus">experience</fex>.</ex> <ex> <fex name="Stimulus">The report</fex> was <fex name="Degree">very</fex> <t>alarming</t> <fex name="Experiencer">to me</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Stimulus
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Stimulus</fen> is the object or event which brings about the emotion in the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Experiencer
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Experiencer</fen> experiences the emotion brought about by the <fen>Stimulus</fen></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>Degree to which the <fen>Stimulus</fen> evokes the emotion in the <fen>Experiencer</fen></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE marks expressions that indicate a set of conditions under which the <fen>Stimulus</fen> is able to bring about the emotion.
<ex> <fex name="Circumstances">When sunny</fex> the view is <t>impressive</t>. </ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Parameter
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Parameter</fen> is the area in which the <fen>Stimulus</fen> brings about an effect on the Experiencer.
<ex> This art work is <fex name="Parameter">aesthetically</fex> <t>pleasing</t>.</ex> <ex>The book is <fex name="Parameter">emotionally</fex> <t>disturbing</t>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Comparison_set
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Comparison_set</fen> is the set of individuals the <fen>Stimulus</fen> is compared to when determining the <fen>Degree</fen> of the emotional reaction. <ex>Randy is very <t>stimulating</t> <fex name="Comparison_set">for a curator</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Property
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE indicates a <fen>Property</fen> of the <fen>Stimulus</fen> which causes a particular experience. <ex>The movie is <t>terrifying</t> <fex name="Property">in its realism</fex></ex> <ex>The movie is <t>terrifying</t> <fex name="Property">in its use of violence</fex></ex> <ex>The move was <t>disappointing</t> <fex name="Property">in every respect </fex>. </ex>
</def-root>

lexUnit.name: alarming.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: bringing about a state of alarm or worry

lexUnit.name: agonizing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing great mental or phsyical anguish

lexUnit.name: maddening.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: bringing about anger or frustration

lexUnit.name: sobering.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: brings about sober and serious feelings

lexUnit.name: pathetic.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: arousing pity, especially through vulnerability or sadness.

lexUnit.name: aggravating.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: bringing about annoyance or exasperation.

lexUnit.name: vexing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: brings about feelings of annoyance and exasperation

lexUnit.name: revolting.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: brings about feelings of disgust

lexUnit.name: heartening.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: bringing about confidence and cheerfulness

lexUnit.name: disheartening.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: brings about a loss of determination or confidence.

lexUnit.name: cheering.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: heart-warming; posessing a quality that causes people to become happier

lexUnit.name: disillusioning.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing disappointment at losing a belief or ideal

lexUnit.name: unnerving.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing a loss of confidence or courage

lexUnit.name: tormenting.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing severe mental or physical anguish

lexUnit.name: thrilling.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing feelings of pleasure and excitement

lexUnit.name: shocking.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing disgust and great surprise

lexUnit.name: surprising.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing feelings of surprise and astonishment

lexUnit.name: pleasing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing feelings of satisfaction and happiness

lexUnit.name: pleasant.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: giving a sense of happy satisfaction or enjoyment.

lexUnit.name: unpleasant.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: giving a sense of unhappiness and dissatisfaction

lexUnit.name: uplifting.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing an increase of positive feelings

lexUnit.name: mortifying.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing feelings of embarassment and humiliation

lexUnit.name: annoying.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing feelings of anger and frustration

lexUnit.name: boring.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: bringing about feelings or weariness and boredom

lexUnit.name: encouraging.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: bringing about feelings of hope and confidence

lexUnit.name: tiresome.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: causing one to feel bored or impatient.

lexUnit.name: astounding.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: shocking, or causing great surprise

lexUnit.name: baffling.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing bewilderment; perplexing or confusing

lexUnit.name: calming.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: bringing about feelings of tranquility and quietness

lexUnit.name: relaxing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing a reduction in tension and anxiety

lexUnit.name: depressing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing feelings of dejection and dispair.

lexUnit.name: disappointing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: failing to fufill expectation, desires and hopes

lexUnit.name: disconcerting.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: throwing into confusion; upsetting, unnerving

lexUnit.name: discouraging.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing a loss of enthusiasm, confidence or hope

lexUnit.name: disturbing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: bringing about anxiety and fear

lexUnit.name: embarrassing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing someone to feel ashamed, self-conscious or awkward

lexUnit.name: enthralling.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: capturing the attention of, captivating

lexUnit.name: exciting.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing feelings of eagerness and enthusiasm

lexUnit.name: exhilarating.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing feelings of happiness and excitement

lexUnit.name: pacifying.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing feelings of peace and calm

lexUnit.name: stressful.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing feelings of anxiety, tension and mental strain

lexUnit.name: heart-rending.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: causing great sadness or distress.

lexUnit.name: suspenseful.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing intense and anxious uncertainty

lexUnit.name: sad.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: causing or characterized by sorrow or regret.

lexUnit.name: hilarious.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing much laughter or amusement

lexUnit.name: unfunny.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: (especially of something intended to be funny) not amusing

lexUnit.name: droll.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: amusing in a strange or quaint way.

lexUnit.name: white-knuckle.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: causing fear or nervous excitement

lexUnit.name: tear-jerking.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing sadness or sympathy in a calculated manner

lexUnit.name: devastating.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: causing severe shock or grief

lexUnit.name: intriguing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: arousing excitement, interest or curiousity; fascinating

lexUnit.name: fascinating.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: extremely charming, stimulating or interesting

lexUnit.name: offensive.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing resentment, displeasure, or hurt

lexUnit.name: mind-numbing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing a state of mental exhaustion

lexUnit.name: tedious.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: too long, slow, or dull.

lexUnit.name: gripping.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: arousing and holding the interest of

lexUnit.name: absorbing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: arousing and fully holding one's attention

lexUnit.name: engrossing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: arousing and completely holding the attention or interest of

lexUnit.name: tiring.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: exhausting the interest or patience of

lexUnit.name: intimidating.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: frightening, bringing about fear and awe

lexUnit.name: traumatising.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing emotional and psychic distress

lexUnit.name: traumatic.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing emotional or psychic distress

lexUnit.name: poignant.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: evoking a keen sense of sadness or regret.

lexUnit.name: disorientating.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing confusion and a loss of direction

lexUnit.name: thorny.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: causing distress, difficulty, or trouble.

lexUnit.name: invigorating.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: giving strength, energy, and excitement

lexUnit.name: dreadful.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: extremely shocking, distasteful or unpleasant

lexUnit.name: delight.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a cause or source of great pleasure.

lexUnit.name: aggravation.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a cause of irritation or provocation

lexUnit.name: annoyance.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a source of irritation or vexation

lexUnit.name: vexation.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a cause of irritation and trouble

lexUnit.name: amazing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing great surprise, often due to seeming or virtual impossibility.

lexUnit.name: empty.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: having no value or purpose.

lexUnit.name: full.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: satisfying due to abundance and variety.

lexUnit.name: rich.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: full of interesting diversity or complexity.

lexUnit.name: impressive.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: evoking admiration through size, quality, or skill

lexUnit.name: formidable.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: inspiring fear or respect through being impressively large, powerful, or capable.

lexUnit.name: striking.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: surprising, noticeable, especially due to beauty or appearance.

lexUnit.name: charm [mass].n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the power or quality of delighting, attracting, or fascinating others.

lexUnit.name: charm [count].n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an attractive characteristic or feature.

lexUnit.name: relaxation.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the action of relaxing or the state of being relaxed.

lexUnit.name: insulting.a
lexUnit.definition: Having the effect of an insult

lexUnit.name: rest.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: being in the state of not working

lexUnit.name: color.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: vividness and variety and interest

lexUnit.name: strike a chord.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to produce an emotional response.
